title: Path of Transformation
description: 2010-12-29 - Awakening arises out of presence with the changing ground of our lives. This talk explores three key gateways to liberating presence: Forgiveness, inner fire (aspiration) and a deep inquiry into the nature of our own mind. This talk was given at the IMCW New Year's Retreat.  Please support this podcast by donating at www.tarabrach.com or www.imcw.org. Thank you!
